Kansas_City.Union Hill, Kansas City:
Union Hill is a historic neighborhood in Kansas City, Missouri. The neighborhood is located between 27th Street and 31st Street and Main Street to Gillham Road.
The Founders at Union Hill, a 9.2-acre (3.7 ha) mixed-use, luxury urban development, is located north/south from 27th Terrace to 31st Street and west/east from Oak Street to Gillham Road.
